item.title: Hugo Installation and Blog Creation
item.description: Hugo Installation and Blog Creation 一、Install Hugo 1. Download hugo binary file 2. Hugo binary file doesn’t need to be installed,just add paths to system environment variable PATH.(My Computer-Attribute-Advanced System Settings-Environment Variable)Then select PATH,click Edit,and finally copy location of hugo binary file to PATH. (PS. this is windows system.if mac,you can use package management tool—brew.) 二、Generate site 1. command line—hugo new site [site’s name].(eg. hugo new site myblog,default installation on C disk.
